title: Crypto custody firm Copper in early talks for IPO as crypto 'plumbing' becomes new Wall Street favorite
full_text: Crypto custody firm Copper in early talks for IPO as crypto 'plumbing' becomes new Wall Street favorite. The London-based custody provider is weighing a potential public listing, aiming to follow rival BitGo's recent IPO.. Crypto custody firm Copper is in early talks about a public listing, according to three people with knowledge of the matter. Goldman Sachs, Citi and Deutsche Bank are among the investment banks pote… [+3404 chars]
